jobDescription: As a CPU Architecture and Performance Engineer, you'll improve processor instruction set architecture, develop innovative microarchitecture features, and help deliver Google’s advanced hardware products. You’ll collaborate with system performance and software teams to analyze application and benchmark performance and to project their performance at various design phases. You’ll be guided by a Senior CPU Architect and work with engineers in power, thermal, security, physical design, and other subsystem teams to determine the CPU subsystem configuration and features, and to support the integration of CPU subsystem.
jobResponsibility: Evaluate ARM’s architecture features from both architecture and performance angles.
Develop performance model for performance analysis and micro-architecture study.
Project, analyze, and debug pre-silicon and post-silicon application performance.
Work with CPU architect to determine CPU subsystem architecture specifications.
educationalRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience in modern, high-performance CPU/ML architecture and micro-architecture.
Experience in performance modeling, performance analysis, and workload characterization.
Experience with a general purpose programming language (e.g., C/C++, Python).
Experience in integrating ARM cores into ASICs at architectural and RTL levels.

jobDescription: Netflix is seeking an Executive Assistant (EA) to support the company’s Content Finance Controller. This position plays a very important role in supporting the overall Controllership organization, partnering closely with the organization’s HR partners, to identify issues and solutions affecting both the morale and cultural health of the organization.  This role aids in fostering an inclusive environment through accelerating operational deliverables, while applying a humanistic people first mindset and building cohesion across the team.  The Content Controller’s EA plays an important part in driving Content Finance Controllership leadership (i.e., CFC’s direct staff) by managing agendas, holding team members accountable to action items, coordinating onsites/offsites and establishing working relationships inside and outside of the group.
jobResponsibility: Proactive management of calendar, travel, and expenses
Scheduling complex and high-visibility meetings and calls, internally & externally
Coordinate travel arrangements and process expense reports
Creating presentations and documents using Google Suite
The ability to assist with team projects and events as needed
Coordinating large team offsite events & activities
Maintaining professionalism in dealing with senior executives
Supporting onboarding of new team members (eg logistics, etc)
educationalRequirements: Strong writing and editing skills
Experience supporting multiple leaders in a Finance org is highly preferred
High attention to detail
Responsive and able to work flexibly across multiple time zones
Able to stay calm under pressure and work on short deadlines
Independent worker, with strong judgment and ability to make decisions quickly
Discreet with the ability to maintain confidential information
Demonstrated ability to design and improve processes
High level of integrity and discretion
Experiences: 7+ years of experience managing multiple executive calendars.

jobDescription: A well-established multinational company that has single-handedly transformed the tech industry with their next-gen products and services, is looking for a Full-Stack Developer. The developer will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining APIs, user-facing experiences, services, and systems. Customers will be able to work and casually browse across IT data centers and the cloud thanks to the NYSE-listed company's cutting-edge hardware and software services. This is a rare opportunity for developers who are eager to work with a team of industry professionals in an MNC.
jobResponsibility: Design user-facing features to boost platform engagement
Manage the database administration and hosting responsibilities
Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software systems to improve platform efficiency
Design and implement efficient APIs
Collaborate with the internal team to understand customer demand and develop highly responsive applications
Understand market demands to conceptualize new product features from the ground up
educationalRequirements: Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints
Solid understanding of performance marketing, conversion, and online customer acquisition
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in SEO and SEM
In-depth experience with website analytics tools (e.g, Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends)

jobDescription: We are looking for a passionate SEO analyst to join our outstanding marketing team. Analyzing and spotting gaps in website content, optimizing pages for upgraded search results, creating backlinks, and monitoring content development will be the main responsibilities of the SEO analyst. You should be competent in identifying marketing possibilities and strategies to boost website traffic.
jobResponsibility: Convert designs from Figma into pixel-perfect responsive web pages.
Develop custom Gutenberg blocks using Carbon fields or ACF.
Maintain sites built with Elementor and Gutenberg.
Work closely with designers on implementing designs into code.
Measure and optimise overall web page performances.
Work closely with project managers to ensure projects are delivered in a timely fashion.
Provide timely and accurate estimates for project deliverables.
Hands-on troubleshooting, debugging and fixing of issues during development and post-release for customer support.
educationalRequirements: A sophisticated understanding of HTML semantics and ARIA roles, and knowing their correct application.
Proficient in writing maintainable CSS / SCSS with a strong understanding of Flexbox & experience working with responsive web design CSS frameworks, such as Bootstrap / Semantic UI.
Expert level knowledge of Vanilla JavaScript, ES6, jQuery and at least one popular library such as React or Vue.
Familiar with build tools such as Parcel, WebPack and Gulp.
In-depth knowledge of WordPress custom theme development, template hierarchies, hooks and filter.
Experience with implementing blocks using Gutenberg in WordPress.
Solid experience in PHP as a programming language.
Excellent analytical skills
Good understanding of a relational database like MySQL/MariaDB.
Experiences: 3+ years of professional web development experience.

jobDescription: You are comfortable automating and maintaining cloud infrastructures. You are passionate about learning tools and services, with superb troubleshooting skills, enthusiasm for automating everything, and a sense of ownership.
jobResponsibility: As part of the team, you’ll help architect, build, and implement redundant, resilient, scalable, self-sustaining, and self-healing cloud infrastructures such as AWS. We utilize a variety of automation tools (Chef, Terraform, Packer) along with cloud vendor-specific tools (CloudFormation, OpsWorks, Beanstalk).
Besides client-related project work, you will be participating in internal demo/idea generation/blog posts in order to bring new initiatives and new tools to be implemented with our clients.
educationalRequirements: Bachelor Degree
Experience with the full software development lifecycle and delivery using Agile practices.
Hands-on experience with code merging and promotion and building and managing CI/CD workflows and tools.
Knowledge of IP networking, VPNs, DNS, load balancing, and firewall.
Understanding of cloud-native security requirements.
All things AWS, AWS-CLI, and AWS SDKs.
Scripting (Bash, Python, Ruby, Go, or Javascript)
Containers (Docker or Docker-Compose)

jobDescription: We are hiring an SEO Specialist to enable our users to be best able to find our site and our value-add offerings. The ideal candidate will analyze, review, and implement changes to websites so they are optimized for search engines. This candidate will be able to implement actionable strategies that will improve site visibility.
jobResponsibility: Build an SEO strategy across web entities
Create an implementation roadmap for implementing best practices to drive more engagement
Monitor search algorithms set by search engines to keep up with changes in the SEO landscape
Continually check search terms, rankings and analytics to monitor the performance of websites and make recommendations for improvement
Optimizing copy and landing pages for search engine optimization
Performing ongoing keyword research including discovery and expansion of keyword opportunities
Researching and implementing content recommendations for organic SEO success
Use social media to distribute content and encourage external sites to link back to the site of the organization
Drive targeted and loyal traffic to the website through effective community-building
Employing user experience (UX) and conversion rate optimization methods to turn visitors into active users
educationalRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related field
Comprehensive knowledge of C#, Angular, and .NET Core technologies
Experience with WebAPI, MS SQL Server, and GitHub is a plus
Great command of written and verbal English

jobDescription: We are looking for a passionate SEO analyst to join our outstanding marketing team. Analyzing and spotting gaps in website content, optimizing pages for upgraded search results, creating backlinks, and monitoring content development will be the main responsibilities of the SEO analyst. You should be competent in identifying marketing possibilities and strategies to boost website traffic.
jobResponsibility: Organize and carry out Website and App marketing (SEO and ASO).
Backlink build and content management.
Websites Maintaining (Health Check, Broken link, Meta Tags etc,. )
Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns.
Measure and report performances of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs).
educationalRequirements: Bachelor Degree
Basic knowledge of HTML5 and CSS3
Work experience as an SEO Analyst or similar digital marketing role
Work on CMS like WordPress
Experience with various tools like Google Analytics, Keyword Planner, Ahref, App Radar, Google Search Console etc.
Familiarity with keyword research and management tools
Understanding of ranking factors and search engine optimization practices
Excellent analytical skills
